amendment.description: To expand the eligibility of members of the Selected Reserve under the TRICARE program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1363 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1363 proposed by Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S8625-8631; text: CR S8625) To expand the eligibility of members of the Selected Reserve under the TRICARE program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1363 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1363 proposed by Senator Graham.
